sentence.Network_en: In the conventual buildings attached to this church are the state archives of Venice.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这教堂附属的修道院里,放着威尼斯的政府档案.

sentence.Network_en: From 1755 to 1768 , the conventual area was rebuilt in Baroque style.
sentence.Network_cn: 修道院社区于公元1755年-1768年按巴罗克式的风格重建.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin conventualis, from Latin conventus 'assembly, company' (see convent)

means.word_mean: 1. of communal life sequestered from the world under religious vows
